column4: hmm, i wonder why the topic recommeds pastebin.com, when it adds \r\n as new lines to the texts... (ive seen things break on linux cause of that, when used in some config files)
because http://paste.ubuntu.com/ had issues for a while. I'll go poke the relevant people to change it back.
right, with paste.ubuntu.com you need launchpad account to even get the plain text...
